Translations.Text: Nnan wid ijehlen, i wid iumnen: "lemmer d ayen ilhan, ur a$ zeggwiren $uoes". Imi ur pwanhan ara syis, qqaoen: "ayagi d tikerkas n zik
Uqbel is, Tazmamt n Musa, d nnhaya u d aeunu. Tagi d Tazmamt itebbiten, s wawalen n taaoabt, a ppendeo wid idensen, a ppessefoee lauuam
Ih, wid iqqaoen: "Mass nne$ d Oebbi, d$a ifen degs, ur ppagaden, ur $weblen
Widak d at Loennet, degs ad wekkoen, d arraz n wayen xeddmen

Nweuua amdan ar lewqama s imawlan is. Imma s temeen s tadist, temeen di tinnufra. Ger tadist akked ujumi, caret wagguren. Armi ibbwev d anqaqoi, issawev kueet isegwasen, inna: "a Mass iw! Eoo iyi a K snemmre$ af l$it i $ T$atev, nek akked lwaldin iw; ad xedme$ ayen ilhan ara K ioavin. Efk iyi d tarwa ilhan. Aql i utube$ K, aql i seg imvuaen
Â£uo wigi, Nqebbel lmefruz igiten nnsen, a Nessuref i tucmitin nnsen, ger at Loennet; d lemaahda n tidep, i sen ippuwaaaden

Win innan i imawlan is: "tfuh nnwen! Day yi taahdem a d kkre$? Ni$ aaddan isuta uqbel i". Nitni teppren tacvai n Oebbi: "a ssexv ik, amen! Ih, lmaahda n Oebbi, d tidep". A d yini: "ayagi, siwa tiekayin imezwura
D wigi i$ef iuao wawal iaanan leoyus n leonun akked yimdanen, i ten id izwaren. Ih, nitni d imexsuoen
I akw tiseddarin n wayen xedmen, iwakken ad yili warraz igiten nnsen. Nitni ur pwadensen

Ass ideg ara kecmen ar tmes, wid ijehlen: "tvegaam tieidanin i s tezham, di tmeddurt nnwen di ddunit. Assa, a ppeppuqeiiim s uaaqeb isdullun, imi tessem$waoem iman nnwen di tmurt, ur teklalem; imi tellam tbe$wlem
